L2 : Books and shit.来 (lái): used before a verb; will/shall do sth

L2 : Books and shit.吧 (ba): particle for suggestion or softening a statement

L6 : Where.往 (wǎng): in the direction of; to; towards

L14 : Travel.左右 (zuǒyòu): used after a number; about or so

L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.家 (jiā): measure word for families or establishments like restaurants; companies

L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.件 (jiàn): measure word for clothing or events
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.条 (tiáo): measure word for long; narrow things (rivers; roads; fish)
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.套 (tào): measure word for sets or suits
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.张 (zhāng): measure word for flat objects (paper; photos; tables)
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.把 (bǎ): measure word for objects with handles or handfuls of things
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.楼 (lóu): measure word for buildings or stories of buildings
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.块 (kuài): measure word for pieces (soap; cake); currency (yuan)
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.支 (zhī): measure word for stick-like objects (pens; rifles)
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.节 (jié): measure word for segments (lessons; sections of a train)
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.门 (mén): measure word for subjects or fields of study
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.段 (duàn): measure word for segments; periods of time
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.遍 (biàn): measure word for actions (indicating completion from start to finish)
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.片 (piàn): measure word for slices; tablets; scenery
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.场 (chǎng): measure word for events (movies; operas; sports matches)
L4 : Quantity and Measure Words.道 (dào): measure word for questions; dishes; rivers

L7 : Movement.靠 (kào): to lean against; to rely on

L1 : 1-2.爱 (ài): to love, to like; be prone to; love
L1 : 1-2.爱好 (ài hào): hobby, interest; like, be fond of
L1 : 1-2.吧 (ba): (end of imperative sentence) adds a softened tone
L1 : 1-2.班 (bān): team, class, group, (work) shift, squad; (for) group (of people), (scheduled forms of transportation)
L1 : 1-2.半天 (bàn tiān): half of the day; long time
L1 : 1-2.别 (bié): don't; (with 'shi') raise a supposition of something undesirable happening
L1 : 1-2.病 (bìng): be ill, be sick; sickness, fault
L1 : 1-2.差 (chà): to differ from, be insufficient, fall short of, lack; wrong; poor, inferior
L1 : 1-2.唱歌 (chàng gē): sing a song; go to the karaoke bar
L1 : 1-2.车上 (chē shang): on the bus; in a car
L1 : 1-2.吃饭 (chī fàn): eat a meal; have a meal
L1 : 1-2.出 (chū): go out; to exceed, give out, produce, occur, happen, publish, put forth
L1 : 1-2.出来 (chū lái): move from inside to outside; come out (towards the speaker); emerge; complete, finish
L1 : 1-2.从 (cóng): from (a time, a place, or a point of view)
L1 : 1-2.打 (dǎ): knock, beat; be smashed; attack, fight; mix; (wild animals) catch, hunt
L1 : 1-2.打车 (dǎ chē): take a taxi; hitch a lift
L1 : 1-2.打开 (dǎ kāi): to open up; to turn on
L1 : 1-2.到 (dào): arrive, get to, reach; go to, leave for
L1 : 1-2.地 (dì): land, soil; the earth; ground; location; position; prefecture; space; background; distance; mental state
L1 : 1-2.地 (de): used to create adverbs or adverbial phrases (placed before the predicate)
L1 : 1-2.的 (de): used with an adjective or attributive phrase; to form a noun; to emphasize the doer, time, or place; to give a positive tone
L1 : 1-2.地方 (dì fang): place; spot; room, space; part, respect
L1 : 1-2.地上 (dì shang): on the ground; on the floor
L1 : 1-2.动作 (dòng zuò): movement; motion; action; to take actions, to start moving
L1 : 1-2.读 (dú): to read aloud; to read; way of pronunciation (of a character)
L1 : 1-2.读书 (dú shū): to read a book; to go to school; to study
L1 : 1-2.对不起 (duì bu qǐ): sorry; excuse me; to be unworthy of..., to let ... down
L1 : 1-2.多 (duō): many; much; a lot of; more; be greater in quantity than expected
L1 : 1-2.饭 (fàn): meal; food; cooked rice or other cereals

Difficult words.稍等 (shāo děng): wait a moment; please hold on

Difficult words.结账 (jié zhàng): to settle accounts; to pay the bill
